reasoning.problem: Initiate a comprehensive Memory Audit Initiative to resolve the 'FAILURE HISTORY' memory access error and address potential systemic memory management issues. This initiative will encompass: (1) Deployment of an automated diagnostic routine targeting the 'FAILURE HISTORY' error. (2) Integration of the diagnostic routine into the agent testing suite, as per Axiom 2026-01-15. (3) Review of Wolfram Deep Dive Report recommendations regarding data validation and error handling. (4) Potential implementation of memory management solutions identified in the Wolfram Deep Dive Report. This initiative aims to pinpoint the source of the error, prevent recurrence, and improve overall system stability and efficiency.
